H0.text: Denmark has a single land border; with which country. Germany

H1.text: Denmark has a single land border; with which country. Sweden

H2.text: Denmark has a single land border; with which country. Norway

H3.text: Denmark has a single land border; with which country. Nimska

A4.text: It shares a border of 68 kilometres (42 mi) with Germany to the south

A5.text: Denmark is the southernmost of the Scandinavian countries, lying southwest of Sweden, south of Norway, and north of Germany, with which it shares a short border
